title: A Letter For The Ages
description: According to tradition, after his exile from Spain for his defense of Judaism, the great Ramban (Nachmanides) sent this letter to his son. The letter which many recite weekly gives a blueprint for an ethical life as timely today as it was then. This book presents it as the basis for a beautiful collection of insights, comments, and anecdotes. Includes Bircas HaMazon.
author: Rabbi Avrohom Chaim Feuer
